page.title: 02 MR BOTTERILL THE FARMER
page.content:
Mr Botterill has been a farmer since he left school. He grows wheat,barley,oats,grass,cale,mangles, patatoes and peas. He has {7}assistants {2}men and {5} women. He lives at Lings View.He has 800 sheep. He's got 3 farms and 4 store houses. He likes being a farmer and has 2 sheep dogs.
Mr Botterills father started the farm. He has got for his machinery a sprayer,2 drags,2 drills,3 sets of harrows,5 tractors,1 grain auger,1 combine,1 baler,1 plough,3 grain dryers,1 muckloader,1 muckspreader,1 roll mill,4 cambridge rolls,1 flat roll,1 forklift,1 potato harvester,1 grass mower and 1 potato planter.
